      • getClientCredential

        public static com.google.api.client.googleapis.auth.oauth2.GoogleClientSecrets getClientCredential()
                                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the clientSecrets from CLIENT_SECRET_FILE the first time it is called, then just returns clientSecrets Unused as of now, may be used in future if there is a transition to OAuth 2.0 for all authentication.
        Returns:
        the Client Secrets (private key, other similar fields) as a GoogleClientSecrets object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getRedirectUri

        public static java.lang.String getRedirectUri(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Gets the authentication verification URL for an OAuth 2.0 login request Unused as of now, may be used in future if there is a transition to OAuth 2.0 for all authentication.
        Parameters:
        req - The HTTP request given to a page, used to get url of page
        Returns:
        URL to redirect to

      • authorize

        public static com.google.api.client.googleapis.extensions.appengine.auth.oauth2.AppIdentityCredential authorize(boolean student)
                                                                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an authorization object that is required to make sure the program is allowed to make whatever request it is trying to make Unused as of now, may be used in future if there is a transition to OAuth 2.0 for all authentication.
        Parameters:
        student - Whether to authorize a student or a teacher - true for student
        Returns:
        AppIdentityCredential - an object used in other calls that verifies permissions given to program
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • newFlow

        public static com.google.api.client.googleapis.auth.oauth2.GoogleAuthorizationCodeFlow newFlow()
                                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Generates an object that manages storage of OAuth 2.0 access tokens, refresh tokens, etc. Unused as of now, may be used in future if there is a transition to OAuth 2.0 for all authentication.
        Returns:
        GoogleAuthorizationCodeFlow, which manages login credentials backend.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • teacherFlow

        public static com.google.api.client.googleapis.auth.oauth2.GoogleAuthorizationCodeFlow teacherFlow()
                                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Same as newFlow, but asks for scopes in teacherScopes
        Returns:
        GoogleAuthorizationCodeFlow, which manages login credentials backend Unused as of now, may be used in future if there is a transition to OAuth 2.0 for all authentication.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getClassroomService

        public static com.google.api.services.classroom.Classroom getClassroomService(boolean student)
                                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Using a credential, gets Google Classroom object which allows requests to be made from it Unused as of now, may be used in future if there is a transition to OAuth 2.0 for all authentication.
        Parameters:
        student - true if student, false if teacher
        Returns:
        Classroom object with authorization to make requests
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

      • getIDMap

        public static com.google.common.collect.BiMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getIDMap()
        Creates a two-directional map of Strings to Integers for conversion between the word on the worksheet to some unique ID number. These lines of code were generated by a Python script at the root of the repository called manual_tests.py.
        Returns:
        A BiMap of Strings to Integers, which is stored as a field if it has already been generated once.
